OOC: Sorry this is taking too long when we shouldn't even be fighting.  If 
anyone has a major problem with my ending this I'll change it otherwise this 
moves the plot along.

::Aerotron::
    He stops his thrust an inch away from Dinotron's head his left arm 
shaking from the wounds inflicted by Dinotron's shots.  He raises and flexes 
his hand and turns his head to face Dinotron.  He finally says "Enough of 
this, I am your better.  Lead us to your base so the three of you can be 
repaired.  I must speak with whomever is in charge there."  Out of the corner 
of his eye he notices Whistler moving.

::Whistler::
    With his head still groggy he awakens to find a truly impressive creature 
there.  He instinctively knows that it was he that shot him.  He tries to sit 
up but he could not.  With a feeble rasp he asks "Who ... are you? ...  Will 
you ... help me?"
